member.name: T:System.Net.Http.Json.HttpClientJsonExtensions
member.summary: Contains the extensions methods for using JSON as the content-type in HttpClient.

member.name: P:System.SR.Argument_InvalidOffLen
member.summary: Offset and length were out of bounds for the array or count is greater than the number of elements from index to the end of the source collection.

member.name: P:System.SR.CharSetInvalid
member.summary: The character set provided in ContentType is invalid.

member.name: P:System.SR.CharSetNotSupported
member.summary: The character set provided in ContentType is not supported.

member.name: P:System.SR.ContentTypeNotSupported
member.summary: The provided ContentType is not supported; the supported types are 'application/json' and the structured syntax suffix 'application/+json'.

member.name: P:System.SR.SerializeWrongType
member.summary: The specified type {0} must derive from the specific value's type {1}.
